title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
description: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as "Hyperlink Options" but it is changing with the settings.
OB: When I click on "OK" and then reopen the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Click on "OK" to close the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Actual Result:
- The title of the hyperlink builder changes to "www.actuate.com".

Expected Result:
- The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as "Hyperlink Options".
